message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to make a bit more to make this worthwhile for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I hope you'll consider it.
